forums.forum_body: These are the rules of the forum! Something EVERYONE should read before use ;) Here you'll find everything you need to know to get you started on Vinted!
This forum section is archived and remains for information only!
Before you start, introduce yourself to other Vinted Moms :)!
Share your experience or ask questions about pregnancy and birth here!
Share your experience or ask questions about pregnancy and birth here!

forums.forum_title: I'm looking for... Kids' clothing and accessories
forums.forum_body: Are you looking for special garment for your baby or child? Here we share the items we're looking for. :)
